name: isValid
description: Tests whether a value meets a validation or data type rule.

params.name: type
params.description: The valid format for the data.

params.name: min
params.description: The minimum valid value; used only for range validation.

params.name: max
params.description: The maximum valid value; used only for range validation.

params.name: pattern
params.description:
A regular expression that the parameter must match;
 used only for regex or regular_expression validation.

coldfusion.notes:
CF8+ - added component as a type option.
CF11+ - no longer allows currency symbols at the start and commas inside a number. Can be reverted to legacy mode by setting this.strictNumberValidation = false in Application.cfc

examples.title: Check to see if a 235 is an integer
examples.description: Use the isValid function with integer as the type.

examples.title: Validate an Email Address
examples.description: Use the isValid function with email as the type.
